contentList.content: Grant a semblance of life to a humanoid corpse, allowing it to answer up to 5 questions.

Skeletons and creatures killed with Acid, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, or Radiant damage no longer have a mouth and can't be made to talk using this spell.

Doesn't work on Undead.
Can recast Speak with Dead without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
